parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.76

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Vehicle Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns array of arrays of all vehicle's magazines with extended information about them.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This command does not return empty magazines from containers, only from the weapon. Use [[magazinesAmmoCargo]] instead.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[magazinesAmmoFull]] vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - unit or vehicle

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[Array]]s in format:
* [[String]]: magazine class name
* [[Number]]: magazine ammo count
* [[Boolean]]: is magazine loaded
* [[Number]]: magazine type:
** -1 = n/a (default if magazine is not loaded)
** 0 - grenade
** 1 - primary weapon mag
** 2 - handgun mag
** 4 - secondary weapon mag
** 4096 - binocular weapon mag
** 65536 - vehicle mag
* [[String]]: magazine location: "Vest", "Uniform", "Backpack", "" or [[currentMuzzle]] if the magazine is loaded

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[magazinesAmmoFull]] [vehicle, includeEmpty] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.99.146475</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - unit or vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> includeEmpty: [[Boolean]] - (Optional, default [[false]]) [[true]] to include empty magazines

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> same as [[#Syntax|Primary Syntax]]
 
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_magazinesAmmoFull = [[magazinesAmmoFull]] [[player]];
<template lineStart="1"><title>codecomment</title><part><name index="1"/><value>/*
[
	["30Rnd_65x39_caseless_mag",30,false,-1,"Uniform"],
	["30Rnd_65x39_caseless_mag",30,false,-1,"Vest"],
	["16Rnd_9x21_Mag",16,false,-1,"Vest"],
	["SmokeShellGreen",1,true,0,"SmokeShellGreenMuzzle"],
	["Chemlight_green",1,true,0,"ChemlightGreenMuzzle"],
	["HandGrenade",1,true,0,"HandGrenadeMuzzle"],
	["30Rnd_65x39_caseless_mag",30,true,1,"arifle_MX_ACO_pointer_F"],
	["16Rnd_9x21_Mag",16,true,2,"hgun_P07_F"]
]
<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>*/</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_magazinesAmmoFull = [[magazinesAmmoFull]] Mi_48;
<template lineStart="1"><title>codecomment</title><part><name index="1"/><value>/*
[
	["250Rnd_30mm_APDS_shells",250,false,-1,""],
	["250Rnd_30mm_HE_shells",250,true,65536,"gatling_30mm"],
	["8Rnd_LG_scalpel",8,true,65536,"missiles_SCALPEL"],
	["38Rnd_80mm_rockets",38,true,65536,"rockets_Skyfire"]
]
<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>*/</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[magazinesAmmo]], [[magazinesAmmoCargo]], [[magazinesDetail]], [[magazines]], [[magazinesTurret]]
</value></part></template>


<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on December 20, 2014 - 14:40 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Actium|Actium]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
When used on vehicles this will only return all magazines associated with a single turretPath (which one depends on the actual armament of the vehicle, usually the first armed turretPath or alternatively turretPath [-1]). <br>
If you want to get all turrets' magazines, use [[allTurrets]] and [[magazinesTurret]].
--[[User:Actium|Actium]] ([[User talk:Actium|talk]]) 15:40, 20 December 2014 (CET)
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on February 10, 2015 - 04:40 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Pierre MGI|Pierre MGI]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
As Actium said, this function seems to extract data from:
configfile >> "CfgVehicles" >> _the_vehicle_you_want >> "Turrets" >> "MainTurret">> "magazines".
Some vehicles return an empty field {} because magazines are in straight in:
configfile >> "CfgVehicles" >> _the_vehicle_you_want >> "magazines" (often dedicated to flares only).

This is the case of WY-55 Hellcat. This function returns an empty array.
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on April 5, 2019 - 22:28 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Yuval|Yuval]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
This command does not include magazines loaded into weapons stored inside player's backpack (or every other container).
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
